wildText: WILD can replace any symbols, except the Scatter, to form winning combinations.
scatterText: 3x SCATTER symbols on reels 1, 3 and 5 triggers the MEGABOARD.
bonusPopBoxMsg1: ROLL THE DICE AND GO AROUND THE MEGABOARD TO PERMANENTLY UPGRADE YOUR FREE SPINS ROUND.
bonusPopBoxMsg2: STAY AHEAD OF THE CHASING BOY ON DUCK WHILE ADDING WILDS, MYSTERIES, MULTIPLIERS, REMOVED SYMBOLS AND INSTANT WINS.
bonusPopBoxMsg3: COMPLETE THREE LAPS WITHOUT GETTING CAUGHT TO REACH BIG MONEY AND MULTIPLY ALL YOUR WINNINGS BY UP TO X10.
